00029 void Player::Event(ALLEGRO_EVENT event)
00030 {
00031         switch (event.type)
00032         {
00033                 case ALLEGRO_EVENT_KEY_DOWN:
00034                         Keypress(event.keyboard.keycode);
00035                         break;
00036 
00037                 case ALLEGRO_EVENT_KEY_UP:
00038                         Keyrelease(event.keyboard.keycode);
00039                         break;
00040 
00041                 default:
00042                         break;
00043         }
00044 
00045         Vector vel;
00046         if(up)
00047                 vel+=Vector(0, -1);
00048         if(down)
00049                 vel+=Vector(0, 1);
00050         if(left)
00051                 vel+=Vector(-1, 0);
00052         if(right)
00053                 vel+=Vector(1, 0);
00054         Set_movement(vel);
00055 }

00058 void Player::Keypress(int keycode)
00059 {
00060         switch (keycode)
00061         {
00062                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_UP:
00063                         up = true;
00064                         break;
00065 
00066                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_DOWN:
00067                         down = true;
00068                         break;
00069 
00070                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_LEFT:
00071                         left = true;
00072                         break;
00073 
00074                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_RIGHT:
00075                         right = true;
00076                         break;
00077 
00078                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_A:
00079                 {
00080                         Map* map = game->Get_map();
00081                         mon_assert(NULL != map && "Game returned a NULL map.\n");
00082                         /* We are looking for a "radius", which I'm just fudging and taking
00083                          * the tile width defined in the map.  Though, to be more accurate,
00084                          * there should be another determiner (maybe even the average of
00085                          * the tile width*height).
00086                          */
00087                         map->Pick_up(position, map->Get_TileWidth(), this, true);
00088                         break;
00089                 }
00090 
00091                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_Z:
00092                 {
00093                         Map* map = game->Get_map();
00094                         mon_assert(NULL != map && "Game returned a NULL map.\n");
00095                         /* We are looking for a "radius", which I'm just fudging and taking
00096                          * the tile width defined in the map.  Though, to be more accurate,
00097                          * there should be another determiner (maybe even the average of
00098                          * the tile width*height).
00099                          */
00100                         map->Interact(position, map->Get_TileWidth(), this);
00101                         Monday_out(SUGGESTION_LEVEL, std::cout, "Collected items: %d\n", this->Get_entities().size());
00102                         break;
00103                 }
00104 
00105                 default:
00106                         break;
00107         }
00108 }

00111 void Player::Keyrelease(int keycode)
00112 {
00113         switch (keycode)
00114         {
00115                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_UP:
00116                         up = false;
00117                         break;
00118 
00119                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_DOWN:
00120                         down = false;
00121                         break;
00122 
00123                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_LEFT:
00124                         left = false;
00125                         break;
00126 
00127                 case ALLEGRO_KEY_RIGHT:
00128                         right = false;
00129                         break;
00130 
00131                 default:
00132                         break;
00133         }
00134 }

00137 void Player::Render(const Camera& camera)
00138 {
00139         /* Allow Entity's default Render() to be called first */
00140         Entity::Render(camera);
00141 
00142         Vector rpos = camera.Apply(Entity::position);
00143         float x = Entity::position.X();
00144         float y = Entity::position.Y();
00145 
00146         /* If any level of debugging is turned on, show the player's coordinates */
00147         if (showDebug > CRITICAL_LEVEL && showDebug < NUM_DEBUG_DEFINITIONS)
00148         {
00149                 ALLEGRO_COLOR green = al_map_rgba_f(0.25, 0.75, 0.25, 1);
00150                 ALLEGRO_COLOR black = al_map_rgba_f(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1);
00151                 ALLEGRO_FONT* font = game->Get_font();
00152                 std::stringstream ss;
00153                 Monday_out(showDebug, ss, "(%d,%d): (%d,%d)..(%d,%d)", int(x), int(y), int(x - size), int(y - size), int(x + size), int(y + size));
00154                 std::string positionStr = ss.str();
00155 
00156                 /* Black, slightly offset lettering to increase visibility */
00157                 al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, black);
00158                 al_font_textout_centre(font, al_get_display_width() / 2 + 1, 12 + 1, positionStr.c_str(), -1);
00159 
00160                 /* Green lettering */
00161                 al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, green);
00162                 al_font_textout_centre(font, al_get_display_width() / 2, 12, positionStr.c_str(), -1);
00163 
00164                 /* Restore the blender to normal */
00165                 al_set_blender(ALLEGRO_ALPHA, ALLEGRO_INVERSE_ALPHA, al_map_rgba_f(1, 1, 1, 1));
00166         }
00167 }
